Class SSJava

java.lang.Object

      com.asdf.ssjava.SSJava
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
public class SSJava
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game

The equivalent of the main class. Contains game loop and event responding methods.

Author:
Jeremy Brown, Simon Thompson

checkLevelCompletion

public static boolean checkLevelCompletion(int level)
Checks the preferences to see if the specified level has been completed.

Parameters:
level - the specified level
Returns:
true if the highest completed level is greater than the specified level; false otherwise
